headline: Proactive Testing and Treatments
description: Instalab gives you direct access to all the preventative tests you need to do this year to stay on top of your health. Trusted by tens of thousands of top-performing founders, executives, and professional athletes.

## Healthcare, without the hassle.
Stay on top of your health—stress-free.
The Old Way
The Instalab Way
**Unclear What To Do:** Not sure what tests you should be getting to stay ahead?
**Personalized Testing Strategy:** Get a clear customized plan designed for your health goals and longevity.
**Limited Access:** Not getting the tests or specialist referrals you need?
**Fast Approvals:** We handle all the work to get any test or specialist visit approved quickly.
**Confusing Results:** Overwhelmed by medical jargon and unclear reports?
**Clear Explanations:** Easy-to-understand breakdowns of all your test results and next steps.
**Specialist Struggles:** Can't find the right doctor for a specific issue?
**Expert Access:** We match you with top specialists perfectly suited to your health needs.
**Appointment Nightmares:** Endless phone calls and scheduling hassles?
**Effortless Scheduling:** We coordinate and book all your medical appointments for you.
**Insurance Headaches:** Confused about coverage and claims?
**Insurance Support:** We navigate pre-approvals, claims, and coverage to maximize your benefits.
Get Started Now

Testing & Results

Health Planning

Patient Advocacy
Worked with patient’s insurance to secure coverage for a PCSK9 inhibitor, saving him over $5,000 annually.
Medication Support

Testing & Results
Reviewed a patient’s supplement regimen for effectiveness, and recommended changes based on latest test results.

## Real patients, real results
See how ambitious professionals like you are taking control of their health with Instalab.
"I thought that Instalab was mostly for testing at first. But it’s way more than that. I have a dedicated person (Allona) finding me doctors and scheduling and rescheduling my visits. I have a roadmap for testing, including a doctor to help me understand the results. And instead of pdfs in my email, my results are all in one place. At $99/month, I feel like I discovered a loophole or something - it’s an insanely good deal."
![Steph Simon](https://www.instalab.com/img/people/steph.jpeg)
#### Steph Simon
CEO @ StealthCo
"Instalab uncovered something life-changing that I never would have found on my own—early osteoporosis caused by silent celiac disease. They took care of every detail, from arranging the right tests to connecting me with exceptional specialists for treatment. Beyond that, their ongoing support has given me the confidence to take charge of my health in a way I never thought possible."
![Jason Goldman](https://www.instalab.com/img/jason.jpg)
#### Jason Goldman
Filmmaker @ Wild Growth Media
"Staying on top of your health is a must for the best founders. Instalab made it simple for me by arranging all the testing and breaking down my results into actionable steps. Their personalized guidance helped me focus on the right areas to improve my health and longevity."
![Gustaf Alstromer](https://www.instalab.com/img/gustaf.jpg)
#### Gustaf Alstromer
Partner @ Y Combinator
"I didn’t know my body until I started working with Instalab. A lovely phlebotomist came to me on my schedule - shout out to Layla! It was very frustrating trying to get the same tests from my primary care provider. In 3 months, I have dramatically improved my biomarkers."
![Geoff Abraham](https://www.instalab.com/img/geoff.jpg)
#### Geoff Abraham
Founder @ Spoken
"As a working parent, I don’t have much time to focus on my health. Instalab made it effortless by arranging everything from testing to results interpretation and providing a game plan that worked with my schedule. It’s never been easier to stay proactive about my health."
![Kat Manalac](https://www.instalab.com/img/kat.jpg)
#### Kat Manalac
Partner @ Y Combinator
"Instalab handles the hard stuff—finding doctors, booking appointments, and making sense of results. I finally have a clear plan for my health. They have completely changed how I approach my health."
![Santi Mesa](https://www.instalab.com/img/heart/santi.jpg)
#### Santi Mesa
BD @ SAP
Join Them Today
## Not ready for a membership?
You can still order individual tests anytime—no subscription required.
Browse Test Catalog 
## Explore our free health resources
Start optimizing your health today with our tools and research
![Top 3 Metrics to Track with a DEXA Scan](https://www.instalab.com/img/dexa-scan.jpg)
### Top 3 Metrics to Track with a DEXA Scan
7 Min Read
Most people think of DEXA scans as just a tool for measuring body fat precisely, but their true value lies in the deeper insights they provide. Visceral fat, muscle mass, and bone density are the three metrics that matter most. Together, they paint a clearer picture of your metabolic health, strength, and long-term risk for conditions like insulin resistance, fractures, and frailty.
![The Problem With Cardiovascular Risk Calculators](https://www.instalab.com/img/blogs/calculator.jpg)
### The Problem With Cardiovascular Risk Calculators
8 Min Read
Risk calculators like the _Framingham Risk Score_ have long been a cornerstone of cardiovascular medicine, estimating your chances of a heart attack or stroke over the next 10 years.But here's the problem: cardiovascular disease (CVD) is a slow, silent process that often begins in your teens and unfolds over decades. Limiting the assessment to just 10 years is far too narrow to fully capture the long-term damage accumulating in your arteries over a lifetime.
![How a CAC Test Could Save Your Life](https://www.instalab.com/img/cac.jpg)
### How a CAC Test Could Save Your Life
4 Min Read
The Coronary Artery Calcium (CAC) test is a powerful, non-invasive tool for assessing your risk of heart disease. It's a quick scan that measures the calcium buildup in the arteries of your heart, an early indicator of atherosclerosis—a condition that leads to heart disease. By providing a CAC score, the test offers a clear picture of your future risk of cardiovascular events, such as heart attacks. The higher your CAC score, the more calcified plaque you have in your arteries, increasing your heart disease risk. On the other hand, a score of zero indicates a low risk of heart disease.
Browse Research

generated_description:
### Instalab: Your Personal Health Concierge

**Overview:**
Instalab is a consumer health tech company based in New York that aims to make proactive healthcare accessible and hassle-free. Founded in 2022, it's part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch and has quickly become a trusted resource for top executives, founders, and professional athletes looking to optimize their health. Their website is [instalab.com](https://www.instalab.com/).

---

**Mission:**
Instalab's mission is clear: Proactive testing and treatments. They handle the complexities of healthcare, enabling their users to focus on their health rather than the logistics of managing it.

---

**Services Offered:**
What sets Instalab apart is their comprehensive concierge service that streamlines health management. Here’s how they operate:

- **Personalized Testing Strategy:** Instalab helps clients identify the right tests for their health needs and longevity goals.
- **Effortless Scheduling:** They coordinate and schedule all medical appointments, easing the burden on busy schedules.
- **Insurance Navigation:** The team assists with pre-approvals and claims management to maximize insurance benefits.
- **Clear Results Analysis:** Instalab provides easy-to-understand breakdowns of test results, avoiding medical jargon.
- **Direct Access to Specialists:** They connect patients with leading medical experts tailored to specific health needs.

---

**Pricing:**
Instalab offers a subscription model at an introductory rate of $49/month (regularly $99), or $499/year (was $999). They also allow for individual test orders without a subscription.

---

**Team & Leadership:**
While the team size is currently unspecified, Instalab has notable backing from Gustaf Alstromer, a Group Partner at Y Combinator, highlighting its credibility in the startup space.

---

**Client Testimonials:**
Users appreciate Instalab for its comprehensive services:

- **Steph Simon**, CEO at StealthCo, found the service invaluable for managing appointments and understanding her health results.
- **Jason Goldman**, a filmmaker, commended Instalab for simplifying health management that aligns with busy demands.
- **Gustaf Alstromer** himself reported significant improvements in his health metrics after using Instalab.

---

**Stats That Speak Volumes:**

- **99% Patient Satisfaction Rate**
- **24-hour Average Turnaround on Requests**
- **3000+ Network of Top Specialists**

---

**Conclusion:**
Instalab represents a paradigm shift in health management, especially for high-achieving individuals who often struggle with traditional healthcare systems. By marrying technology and personalized care, they provide not just tests, but a roadmap for better health. If you're tired of the traditional healthcare headaches and want to take charge proactively, Instalab could be the healthcare partner you’ve been searching for. 

For more information or to join, check out their [website](https://www.instalab.com/).
